name: Snow Stack!
description:
Overview

this game was made for Chill Jam In January 2022

Controls

 if you press the "Space Bar" when the snowman lifts the snowball the Snowman will throw the snowball at the snow,

Features

i used the theme "Winter" and the game play restriction "One Button"

Development Status

this game might get some bug fixes but no other updates

this game is pretty hard, try to get to 100 stacks!
